abstract: The Japanese unit of Wal-Mart Stores, the world’s largest retailer, said Tuesday that it would actively seek opportunities for mergers and acquisitions as a way to grow.
snippet: The Japanese unit of Wal-Mart Stores, the world’s largest retailer, said Tuesday that it would actively seek opportunities for mergers and acquisitions as a way to grow.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese unit of Wal-Mart Stores, the world’s largest retailer, said Tuesday that it would actively seek opportunities for mergers and acquisitions as a way to grow.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Says It Plans Deals in Japan
